body.name: HITHOS Industrial 7-Tier Rotating Bookshelf, Double Wide Bookcase, Open Etagere Bookcase, Wood Corner Shelf with Metal Frame, Tall Storage Display Rack for Home Office, Living Room, Gold White
body.stockDetail: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.
features: LARGE STORAGE: This rotating bookshelf features 7-tier storage capacity, which not only provides sufficient display spaces for your favorite books or collections, but also helps you tuck away all your sundries and makes your living room look neat and tidy

FLEXIBLE ROTATING DESIGN: With the swivel design, this bookcase can be rotated 150 degrees, which allows it to transform into various modes, and thus can meet all your needs. It can be an elegant bookshelf, a space-saving corner shelf, and more importantly, a decorative accent piece

STABLE STRUCTURE：Crafted from thick high-grade MDF and sturdy metal frame, the quality and durability of this display shelf are fully guaranteed. With X-bracing on the back enhancing stability and sturdiness, each tier of the tall standing shelving rack can hold up to 50 lbs. Dimensions: 11” D x 44.1”W x 71.6” H

ABOUT DETAILS: Wall attachment straps and hardware are provided to prevent wood corner shelf from tipping over. And there is a rubber pad designed under each foot to protect your floor from scratches as well

EASY ASSEMBLY & WORRY-FREE PURCHASE: Everything needed for assembly are included in the package. This bookshelf could be easily assembled in less than an hour with the instructions. HITHOS is committed to providing the best products and services. Please feel free to contact us with any question
body.description: HITHOS 150°Rotating Bookshelf - To Better Fit in Your Office Space Features: - 150°Rotating Tube - Wall attachment straps - Rubber Pad Under Each Foot Specifications: - Material: MDF Wood & Metal - Color: Gold White - Size: 11" D x 44.1" W x 71.6" H - Weight Capacity: 50 lbs per Shelf Package Includes: 1 x 7-Tier Bookcase 1 x Set of Assembly Parts 1 x Clear Instructions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I searched and searched through reviews and finally decided this was the prettiest for the price range and I actually love it. What a relief! And now I trust myself to make good buys and it really helped me get organized. Im simple yet still like nice looking things and gently put it together myself in about 2 hours. Once you get the pattern while assembling the second half build up is easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this shelf
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly what I was lot for. I have this weird useless corner in my bedroom. This shelf fits perfectly in there and if I ever want to move it out I can have it be a flat shelf instead of a corner shelf. It's heavy but was easy to put together and looks great. I couldn't be happier with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for.
reviews.reviewText: I looked everywhere for a bookcase that would sit in the corner like this and wasn’t so wide it would stick out past the window frame. This one fit perfectly! It was so easy to assemble and it looks great. So far it seems to be very sturdy and I’m not at all worried about loading it down with books as my collection grows. In fact I plan on buying a second one for the other corner soon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for our daughter when she moved out. She loves it. She said it was pretty and sturdy. She is very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The box it all came in was very heavy. The instructions were easy to read and assemble on my own. When getting to the top shelf the screw and inner pipe seemed to be a little short but then just realized I didn’t tighten everything else all the way. I love the option to have a corner shelf versus a long bookcase. Even the mounting straps were easy to install. Great bookcase for any room whether it be a living room, like where I put mine, or an office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits perfect in a corner
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together. I needed something for a corner in my office and the turn of this made it perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: We love that these can be angled as we have some weird walls in our office. Very versatile and really smart construction. It is inherently designed to be more sturdy, especially with a little weight.They were simple to assemble (maybe an hour if on your own), easy to move, and ultra stable.All my previous bookshelves have had issues with the shelves warping under the weight of my book collection. No more! I even broke down my old shelves to extend these a bit higher and they are a champ.During the assembly, my only recommendation is to put the bolt in the center pole a but earlier as once the shelf is all built up. It can be a minor frustration to line everything up easily. All the holes are properly piloted and all hardware is quality metal. Just make sure you follow the instructions.We got magnetic hooks to add lights and hand bookmarks. The metal frame is awesome for this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I want to replace my other bookshelves with these
reviews.reviewText: It's quite possibly the best bookshelf I've ever bought, the ability to reposition it makes it truly amazing, my only complaint was that the top bolt on the center bar was a huge pain to screw in since it isn't very long and the selves didn't compress enough naturally, after gallons of paint, about a dozen medical books, and anything heavy I could find and finally myself even, i managed to weigh down and compress all the shelves enough otherwise the bolt wouldn't reach the bar through the very top shelf, that bolt should be alittle longer to make it easier to get it into the bar without a huge workout
